Format p-value

Source: R/format_p.R
format_p.Rd

Round and format p-values

Usage

format_p(x, digits = 1)

Arguments

x

numeric vector of p-values

digits

number of digits large p-values will be rounded to. Default is 2, and must be one of 1, 2, or 3.

Value

a string

Examples

p_vec <- c(0.00001, 0.01111, 0.0500000, 0.15, 0.99999)
format_p(p_vec)
#> [1] "<0.001" "0.011"  "0.050"  "0.15"   ">0.9"  
format_p(p_vec, 2)
#> [1] "<0.001" "0.011"  "0.050"  "0.15"   ">0.99" 
format_p(p_vec, 3)
#> [1] "<0.001" "0.011"  "0.050"  "0.150"  ">0.999"
